DOC.brief_summary: Checking of gastric residuals prior to the continuation/increase of enteral feeding prolongs the time to establish full gastric feeding in the early postnatal period.
DOC.criteria: Infants with a birth weight ≥ 1500g and < 2000g Age ≤48 hours of life Informed, written parental consent Antenatally recognized gastrointestinal malformation Major congenital anomaly Chromosomal anomaly NEC stage II Severe acidosis, asphyxia (pH <7.0) Severe growth restriction below 3rd percentile
